name: .ZS8 File Extension
summary: Learn about .ZS8 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File saved by ZSNES, an SNES emulator for PCs; contains an emulated save state of game progress; can be used to save and load game progress at any point during a game.

content: ZSNES provides numerous save states from 0 to 99 (file extensions .ZS0, .ZS1, .ZS2, and so on). Change the game save state by pressing the "F3" key and using the arrow keys to navigate to one of the 0-9 states, or select the "Pick State" option under the "Game" menu.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
